review: Works great!... Was nice being able to watch Netflix and Amazon instant videos on my tv... Picture was great and it was really easy to install!!!....can't believe its just $40!
author: Peta "PetaS"

review: Fire Stick could not successfully log into my unprotected WiFi.  It worked fine for two others, but not for me.  I returned it.
author: Mark Haskoe

review: The device took longer than expected for delivery but when it arrive it was all configured for my Prime account. It is easy to setup and use. Video quality is very good. At times it does seem to reboot often. I wish there was more free Prime content. All in all it is well worth the $35 cost.
author: Douglas R. Skinner "Chris Fan"

review: The screen casting with 2015 galaxy tablet s 10.1 does not work.  very disappointing.  If I hadn't gotten at a huge discount I would return for chromecast
author: BRIAN F.

review: I like the Fire stick, but find the Fire to be a better option over the stick. I have both. I've had the Fire for months on the living room tv and love how easy it is to use. My four year old can even operate it. So, when our Chrome device on my daughters tv when out I ordered the fire stick as a replacement. It's good. Still easy enough for her to use and if you aren't particular a great option for someone who doesn't want to pay the higher cost for the Fire. There are some notable differences between the two deceives,though.The remote is better constructed and more responsive on the Fire. Plus, the fire has HBOGO and the stick doesn't, which if I knew at the time of ordering, would have affected my decision to purchase it over the Fire. Overall both are good devices and I would recommend.
author: Peedelee
